constant.label: constant
constant.detail: Checks if a variable has the exact same value as a constant. Can check constants from object instances as well.

defined.label: defined
defined.detail: Checks if a variable is defined in the current context.

divisibleby.label: divisibleby
divisibleby.detail: Checks if a variable is divisible by a number.

empty.label: empty
empty.detail: Checks if a variable is an empty string, empty array, empty hash, exactly false, or exactly null.

even.label: even
even.detail: Checks if the given number is even.

iterable.label: iterable
iterable.detail: Checks if a variable is an array or a traversable object.

null.label: null
null.detail: Checks if the variable is null.

odd.label: odd
odd.detail: Checks if the given number is odd.

sameas.label: sameas
sameas.detail: Checks if a variable is the same as another variable. Equivalent to '===' in PHP.
